title: Bikers ride to aid Santa
content:
BEDFORD — Everyone knows Santa employs a team of reindeer to power his sleigh from rooftop to rooftop each Christmas Eve. 
  
For most, the sight of Santa cruising atop a Harley or Honda is unimaginable.
